definition[0]: to crush something so that it becomes smaller and bent, or to be crushed in this way
example[0]: Dan tore the page out, crumpled it, and threw it in the wastepaper basket.
definition[1]: if your face crumples, you suddenly look sad or disappointed, as if you might cry
definition[2]: if your body crumples, you fall down in an uncontrolled way
example[1]: The blow hit him on the head and he crumpled to the ground.
